DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial will evaluate the efficacy of an amino acid formula in infants with allergic manifestations.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Efficacy of an Amino Acid Based Formula in Infants
DOC.criteria: Weight loss within the past 4 weeks Infants 112 months of age feeding a hypoallergenic formula for at least 2 weeks Birth weight greater than or equal to 1500 grams Solely enteral fed Infants with at least one persistent allergy symptom No change in medication within 10 days of beginning the study and no plans for change during the first 10 days of the study Signed informed consent History of underlying condition which, in the Investigator's opinion, could interfere with normal growth, development, or assessment of the participant Metabolic disease requiring special attention
